org.dyndns.beefochu.cxreader.backend.ejb

Class ReaderFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyndns.beefochu.cxreader.backend.ejb.ReaderFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reader

    @Named
@DeclareRoles(value="users")
@RolesAllowed(value="users")
public class ReaderFacade
extends Object
implements Reader

      • getFeedList

        public List<FeedUserRelation> getFeedList()
        Description copied from interface: Reader
        Returns a list with all feeds of the user. The user needs to be logged in via JAAS.
        Specified by:
        getFeedList in interface Reader

      • bookmarkFeed

        public FeedUserRelation bookmarkFeed(URL feedUrl)
                              throws FeedUrlInvalidException,
                                     FeedAlreadyInListException
        Description copied from interface: Reader
        Adds a feed to the feedlist of the user.
        Specified by:
        bookmarkFeed in interface Reader
        Parameters:
        feedUrl - The URL for the feed the user want to bookmark.
        Throws:
        FeedUrlInvalidException - if the URL doesn't point to a feed that is supportet by the software
        FeedAlreadyInListException - Thrown when the Feed is allready bookmarked by the user

      • removeBookmarkedFeed

        public void removeBookmarkedFeed(FeedUserRelation feedUserRelation)
        Specified by:
        removeBookmarkedFeed in interface Reader
        Parameters:
        feedUserRelation - The feed the user want to remove from his bookmark list. Only feeds retrived by #getFeedList(java.lang.String) should be used! If using other FeedUserRelation objects, nothing happens.

      • getEntries

        public List<FeedEntryUserRelation> getEntries(FeedUserRelation feed,
                                     int offset,
                                     int count,
                                     boolean unreadOnly)
        Description copied from interface: Reader
        Returns entries of a feed. The entries are ordered by date, newest first.
        Specified by:
        getEntries in interface Reader
        offset - The number of the first entry in the list.
        count - The number of entries that should be transfered. If -1 than all entries starting from offset are returned.
        unreadOnly - When true this methode returns only feed entries that aren't read by the user. When false, all entries are returned.
        Returns:

      • getEntries

        public List<FeedEntryUserRelation> getEntries(FeedUserRelation feed,
                                     Date newerThan)
        Description copied from interface: Reader
        Returns entries of a feed. The entries are ordered by date, newest first.
        Specified by:
        getEntries in interface Reader
        newerThan - Only feeds that are newer than this date are returned. This Date is expected be in UTC time zone.
        Returns:

      • setReadStatus

        public void setReadStatus(FeedEntryUserRelation entry,
                 boolean read)
        Description copied from interface: Reader
        Mark an feed entry as read or not read for a specific user.
        Specified by:
        setReadStatus in interface Reader
        read - When true the entry get's marked as read. When not it get's marked as unread.
